title: Job Openings at the Label Store
content:
The Label Store is a dynamic retail business that caters to a diverse range of customer needs. In addition to clothing and accessories, they also offer a carefully curated selection of groceries. With an emphasis on high quality and healthy products, the Label Store's grocery section is a favorite among health conscious shoppers. From fresh produce to pantry staples, the Label Store ensures that all of their products meet strict quality standards. With a dedication to offering an unparalleled shopping experience, the Label Store has become a one-stop-shop for customers looking for fashion forward clothing, stylish accessoriesand wholesome groceries.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



1.) Sales Supervisor

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Assist in the administration of floor Staff/Security
	Staff discipline and scheduling under the supervision of a manager.
	Ensure customer satisfaction and customer service
	Management of staff gate.
	Merchandising of stocks according to principles and ethics.
	Management of stock re-ordering and ensuring that shop attendants submit their stock out list on weekly basis to the procurement department and confirm the quantity to be procured based on history.
	Ensure all procedures are strictly adhered to.
	Prepare roasters latest by Friday of every week.
	Supervision of Shop Floor
	Any other duty that may be assigned from time to time.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 3 - 6 years of experience.


Application Closing Date: 30th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: thelabelstoreng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Accountant

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Provide accounting and clerical support to the accounting department
	Type accurately, prepare, and maintain accounting documents and records
	Prepare bank deposits, general ledger postings, and statements
	Research, track, and resolve accounting or documentation problems and discrepancies
	Inform management and compile reports/summaries on activity areas
	Reconcile accounts in a timely manner
	Daily enter key data of financial transactions into the database
	Provide assistance and support to company personnel
	Function in accordance with established standards, procedures, and applicable laws
	Provide constant updates on job knowledge.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 4 - 8 years of experience.


Application Closing Date: 27th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: thelabelstoreng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) 

Female Domestic Staff

Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Perform various household tasks including cleaning, laundry, and organization to maintain a tidy living space
	Prepare and serve nutritious meals according to dietary preferences and restrictions
	Communicate effectively with clients to understand their needs and preferences
	Assist with personal careto enhance the quality of life for clients
	Manage household supplies and inventory, ensuring necessary items are stocked
	Maintain confidentiality and respect clients' privacy at all times.


Application Closing Date: 29th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: thelabelstoreng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Cashier 

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Must have basic Math skills and customer service experience.
	Interested candidates must possess an OND, HND or BSc Degree in any field with 1 year of work experience.


Application Closing Date: 28th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: thelabelstoreng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Administrative Assistant Job at Wellsworth Energy Services Limited
content:
Wellsworth Energy Services Limited (WESL) is a leading provider of energy services to exploration and production companies in Nigeria. By focusing on innovative technology, world-class safety practices, and personnel competence, WESL offers its clients high-quality support for their operations that translates to increased efficiency and lower operating costs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Handle and coordinate active calendars, schedules, and meetings.
	Distribute memos and reports, ensuring timely communication of relevant company updates.
	Monitor office supplies, inventory and liaise with vendors to maintain adequate stock levels.
	Prepare and follow up on internal departmental requisitions for approval.
	Maintain organized filing systems in line with office protocols.
	Manage the scheduling and coordination of pool cars and supervise drivers to ensure efficient transportation services.
	Supervise office cleaners to ensure that the office and its premises remain clean, tidy, and well-maintained.
	Provide ad hoc administrative support and give assistance to other departments as needed.


Requirements


	A bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or any related field is preferred.
	Strong reporting skills and attention to detail.
	Proficient with administrative software and office tools.
	Smart, proactive, and young professional eager to grow and develop.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Ability to communicate clearly and work effectively with various departments.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@wellsworthenergy.com using "Administrative Assistant Application" as the subject of the email.

title: Verification Inspector Job at Tenaris
content:
Tenaris is the leading global manufacturer and supplier of tubular products and services used in the drilling, completion and production of oil and gas and a leading supplier of tubular products and services used in process and power plants and in specialised industrial and automotive applications.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Verification Inspector

Job Location: Onne, Rivers

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Performs basics process and product control under supervision, verifying procedures compliance and inspecting final products, in a safe and efficient manner according to applicable procedures, complying with defined quality standards


Responsibilities


	Commit with health, safety and environmental policies and notify situations that present potential risk
	Ensure product quality complying with defined standards and reporting deviations
	Carry out duties in an effective manner meeting productivity and efficiency standards in accordance with minimum costs
	Attend and collaborate in training activities in order to maintain and increase the company knowledge
	Proactively suggest improvements and participate in continuous improvement activities
	Perform activities according to applicable procedures
	Complete and update all applicable records ensuring information accuracy
	Ensure proper use of the company assets, detecting and reporting malfunctioning
	Maintain a clean and ordered workplace
	Abide by Tenaris discipline norms
	Perform activities understanding their consequences on the global process


Main activities:


	Ensures instruments are in good condition checking their expiration date and correct functioning
	Performs dimensional and visual inspection of product in process
	Performs dimensional and visual inspection of finished product
	Verifies procedures compliance throughout the process
	Performs quality reports of pipes notifying the defects found
	Updates information in the tracking systems and records the obtained results.

title: Social Media Manager Job at Zowdin Limited
content:
Zowdin Limited is a company committed to excellence in design, construction and real estate development.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager 

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are currently seeking a highly skilled and innovative Social media Manager to join our team, who will be responsible for developing and implementing a comprehensive social media strategy that drives brand awareness, engagement, and sales.


Job Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop high-quality, original content (text, images, videos, graphics) tailored to each social media platform.
	Write engaging captions, blog posts, and other promotional materials that align with the brand's voice.
	Create and edit videos, pictures or animations for campaigns and promotions.
	Collaborate with customer service teams to address concerns raised online.
	Develop and execute social media and content strategies to increase followers and engagement.
	Identify trends, hashtags, and viral content opportunities relevant to the brand.
	Manage day-to-day operations of social media platforms including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Tiktok, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.
	Schedule, post, and monitor content to ensure consistent engagement.
	Respond promptly to comments, messages, and inquiries across platforms.
	Plan and manage social media campaigns and initiatives.
	Monitor social media metrics (engagement, reach, impressions, conversions) to evaluate content performance.
	Generate periodic performance reports and provide actionable insights.
	Use data to optimize strategies and campaigns.
	Ensure consistency in tone, voice, and visuals across all platforms.
	Align content to achieve overarching marketing and branding goals.
	Work closely with the marketing team and other departments to support business goals.
	Coordinate with graphic designers, photographers, and videographers as needed.


Requirements


	A Degree in Marketing or a similar field is an added advantage
	At least 3 years of experience in social media marketing
	A portfolio showing the projects undertaken so far would be preferred
	Proven track record of success in developing and implementing social media strategies that drive engagement and sales.
	Excellent content creation and curation skills, with the ability to create high-quality, engaging content that showcases our companies products and services.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze engagement metrics and adjust the social media strategy accordingly.
	Video Editing and Photoshop Skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with our marketing and sales teams.
	Strong knowledge of social media platforms and their respective audiences.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing situations.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates are invited to submit their CV, portfolio and a cover letter explaining their relevant experience and why they are the best fit for this position to: zowdin.ltd@gmail.com using “Social Media Manager Application”  as the subject of the email.

Note: The Ideal candidate must reside in Abuja.
